Last item for navigation

MAYOR'S OFFICE
==============

|  |
| --- |
| ![Mayor Solomon](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_6189660/Image/City%20Hall/Mayor's%20Office/Message%20From%20The%20Mayor/Solomon1.jpeg "Mayor Solomon") |
| Mayor James S. Solomon |

The Mayor’s Office is the Executive Branch of local government.  With approximately a dozen employees led by the Chief of Staff, the Mayor’s office coordinates with each department and agency across the city, working closely with the city council and conferring with residents, local businesses, and other key stakeholders to establish various policies, laws, and regulations that move the city forward.

![Jersey City](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_6189660/Image/logo/white-logo.png)

Jersey City, New Jersey

Jersey City NJ 07302

201-547-5000

![The City of Jersey City](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_6189660/Templates/redesing/img/footer-logo.png)
